Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.controller

Class AppointmentsMainSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.controller.AppointmentsMainSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentsMainSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class for the Appointments Main Scene
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AppointmentsMainSceneController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void filterAppointmentsAll()
    Filters the ArrayList to display all Appointments in the table view
    void filterAppointmentsByMonth()
    Filters the ArrayList to display only Appointments with a startDateTime property value within the same current month A lambda expression is used as the Consumer for the allAppointments ArrayList.forEach loop in order to compare the startDateTime of each Appointment in the ArrayList to the current Month.
    void filterAppointmentsByWeek()
    Filters the ArrayList to display only Appointments with a startDateTime property value within the same current week period
    static Appointment getCurrentAppointment()
    Gets the value of the currentAppointment property
    void goBackToDashboard()
    Changes the application mainStage Scene to the Dashboard Main Scene
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
    Initializes the controller class.
    void modifyAppt()
    Changes the application mainStage Scene to the Appointments Update Scene
    void selectAllRadioButton()
    Calls the selectRadioButton method with the all flag
    void selectMonthRadioButton()
    Calls the selectRadioButton method with the month flag
    void selectThisAppointmentToModify​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
    When the user clicks and highlights an Appointment in the Main Appointments Table, the application's currentAplication property is set to the value of the selected Appointment object
    void selectWeekRadioButton()
    Calls the selectRadioButton method with the week flag
    static void setCurrentAppointment​(Appointment appt)
    Sets the currentAppointment property to the given Appointment value

      public void selectThisAppointmentToModify​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      When the user clicks and highlights an Appointment in the Main Appointments Table, the application's currentAplication property is set to the value of the selected Appointment object

    • filterAppointmentsAll

      public void filterAppointmentsAll()
      Filters the ArrayList to display all Appointments in the table view

    • filterAppointmentsByMonth

      public void filterAppointmentsByMonth()
      Filters the ArrayList to display only Appointments with a startDateTime property value within the same current month A lambda expression is used as the Consumer for the allAppointments ArrayList.forEach loop in order to compare the startDateTime of each Appointment in the ArrayList to the current Month. If the same, the Appointment is added to the tmp ArrayList that will be returned

    • filterAppointmentsByWeek

      public void filterAppointmentsByWeek()
      Filters the ArrayList to display only Appointments with a startDateTime property value within the same current week period
